Lykta advises advertisers in media data management and media strategy optimisation. Our goal is to optimise  performance & effectiveness of advertising.

## Who are we ?

::: {.column-margin}
![](whoarewe.png)
:::


Two media professionals partnered with a digital agency group (MTV Networks : MountainView, Clicktrust,..) to build solutions in media performance measurement.

**Nicolas** is an expert in media strategy and data management. He worked in a media agency for 10 years where he managed the Insight & Data Team. He then worked 4 years  for BNP Paribas Fortis (Head of Media). Since 2017, Nicolas has been working on data project management for media agencies, media support and media networks.

**Sonia** is an expert in digital performance and data media ecosystems. She has been working in different industries worldwide for 8 years (Cosmetics, Automotive, Banking & Insurance, Luxury).
